pages.text: The spirit extraction system is a way to $(l)retrieve your items$() upon a vault death. To extract the items of a spirit, the spirit needs to be placed onto the $(l)Spirit Extractor$() $(br2)$(l)Please note: This system and it's costs are still under development and might change later on.$()
The cost of extracting items out of a spirit increases each time the player revives a spirit. The costs slowly decrease when the player completes a Vault Objective.

pages.title: Spirit appearences
pages.text: When dying in a $(l)solo vault$(), a spirit will appear at the $(l)player's Overwold spawn location$(). $(br2)When in a $(l)cooperative vault$(), as long as there is a team player alive inside the vault, the spirit will appear at the $(l)death point in the vault$() for a fellow team player to retrieve and bring back to the Overworld by throwing it through the Vault Portal.

When a player is the last to die inside a cooperative vault, their spirit will spawn at the player's spawn location in the Overworld. $(br2) Note that spirits won't appear when playing in $(l)Casual Mode$() or having an inventory restore modifier applied like $(l)Phoenix$() or $(l)Afterlife.$()
